TopicTitle: Took this screen capture just over a year ago, still funny.

Articles.Content:
Rage097, I solute you. Not that I have any problems with steam users (Steam is awesome), it's just... wow.

Anyways the way I found this again is crazy: I was looking through my old picture archives and I found this screen capture I made a while ago. I took this picture on 10/16/2013. Four days and one year ago. Utter luck. The really crazy thing is that I rarely take screen captures and this isn't the first time I've been looking through my pictures and found something randomly taken from almost exactly a year ago.

Later!

Edited October 13, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
